SA21n2961:0: tattvajñānasaṁsiddhi-mahāsukharakāśikā-ṭīkā - sampā-banārasī lāla - om namaḥ śrībhagavatyai vajravārāhyai ānandāmbudhimaṇḍanādupagatā sambuddhalakṣmīrasau sarvākāraguṇānvitā jagadaghadhvāntaughavidhvaṁsinī |
SA21n2961:1: jyotirjñānanidherdhṛtiḥ smṛtinidheḥ śāntirmanīṣānidheḥ pāyādvajravilāsinī bhagavatī lokatrayaṁ durgateḥ ||
SA21n2961:3: śrīvajradevīpada padyareṇurājiṁ namaskṛtya guroḥ padaṁ ca |
SA21n2961:13: kartavya na mama doṣo vīkṣaṇīyo mahājanaiḥ ||
SA21n2961:15: ācārya śrīśūnyatāsamādhivajrapādaḥ śrīvajradevyāḥ sādhanaṁ kartukāmaḥ prathamato bhagavatīsvarūpaguṇodbhāvena(vana)
SA21n2961:20: buddhajñānarasāvilā vikaluṣā svānandasandohadā bhāvābhāvavicāraṇāvirahitā vārāhikā pātu vaḥ || 1 ||
SA21n2961:37: dagdhāritritayā dagdhaṁ aritritayaṁ yayā ariśabdena cakramabhidhīyate,
SA21n2961:39: trilokamahitā tribhirlokaiḥ kāmarūpārūpāvacarairmahitā pūjitā yā sā tathoktā |
SA21n2961:40: athavā cakrayasthitaistathāgatairlokaiḥ pūjitā ata eva pīyūṣadhārāplutā pīyūṣaṁ bodhicittaṁ,
SA21n2961:45: buddhajñānarasāvilā buddhajñānaṁ sadasadādivikalparahitaṁ tadeva rasastena āvilā vyāptā,
SA21n2961:52: “cyutairvirāgasaṁbhūtirvirāgādduḥkhasambhava“ iti pravacanāt tadeva duḥkhaṁ yatsaṁsārāvāhakaṁ karmataḥ ( karma tac )
SA21n2961:54: tathā ca - “ na virāgātparaṁ pāaṁ na puṇyaṁ sukhataḥ paramiti “ |
SA21n2961:64: vidyā buddhakadambakaṁ dahati yā cakratrayorbhedinī sānandā lalitordhvagā sfuratu vā vārāhikā cetasi || 2 ||
SA21n2961:69: vo yuṣmākaṁ cetasi vārāhikā sfuratviti sambandhaḥ |
SA21n2961:71: kādyādivarṇāvṛtā prajñāsvabhāveyaṁ vajravārāhī prajñā ca sakalabāhye yā vyāptā bhagavatī |
SA21n2961:74: amṛtasavā amṛtaṁ bodhicittaṁ tena savaḥ snānaṁ yasyāḥ ,
SA21n2961:75: sūkṣmābjasūtropamā sūkṣmaṁ abjasūtraṁ mṛṇālasūtraṁ tadevopamā yasyāḥ |
SA21n2961:77: vidyā buddhakadambakaṁ dahati yā vidyā locanādayaḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvāḥ buddhā vairocanādayo tayormelakaṁ dahati |
SA21n2961:79: tathā ca hevajre- caṇḍālī jvalitā nābhau dahati pañca tathāgatān |
SA21n2961:80: dahati locanāīṁśca dagdhe haṁ sravate śaśī ||
SA21n2961:98: tasya jñānaṁ samyagavabodhaṁ tasya samyaksiddhimabhidhāsye vārāhīṁ praṇipatya vajrapūrvāṁ vajravārāhīmityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:99: vajrayoginīṁ vajramanupalambhajñānaṁ tena saha yogo asyāstīti |
SA21n2961:116: vijanaṁ sthānaṁ praviśya janarahitaṁ ekākinaiva cittasamādhānakāraṇaṁ vijanamapi sthānaṁ yathā kathaṁcidbhavati |
SA21n2961:118: ata āha mano'nukūla yatra cittasthiratā bhavati,
SA21n2961:120: āsanamupaviśya āsanamapi sāmānyaṁ na sukhakāri ato viśiṣyate sukumāraṁ komalaṁ,
SA21n2961:121: kiṁ viśiṣṭaṁ sannāthāṅkakaḥ nāthaḥ svakīyo gurūḥ tenāṅkitaṁ lakṣitaṁ komalaṁ,
SA21n2961:122: kiṁ viśiṣṭaṁ sannāthāṅkakaḥ nāthaḥ svakīyo gurūḥ tenāṅkitaṁ lakṣitaṁ śiro yasya sa nāthāṅkakaḥ |
SA21n2961:127: vijanaṁ vigato janopalambho yatra vijanaṁ mahāsukhaṁ lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:128: ata eva mano'nukūlaṁ mahāsukha eva jagato'vasthānāt |
SA21n2961:132: nāthāṅkakaḥ nātho vajragurūstasyāṅkaścinhaṁ caturthakṣaṇastatra kaṁ sukhaṁ yasya sa nāthaṅkaḥ ataeva sudhīḥ tadapi kāraṇasavyapekṣam |
SA21n2961:140: tathā ca - “anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukhamiti “ |
SA21n2961:143: tathācāryadevapādāḥ- nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṁ yathā |
SA21n2961:144: na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṁ tathā ||
SA21n2961:147: yacca sukhamanutpādalakṣaṇaṁ tatkālasahitaṁ vā kālarahitaṁ veti rūpyate |
SA21n2961:168: tryakṣarajaptena om āḥ hu ityanena japtena |
SA21n2961:170: vajradharasya sambuddhasya hṛdayaṁ paṅkajaṁ anāmikayā saṁlikhya vajreṇa saṁcālya tathā ca śrīsaṁvaranāthaḥ - “anāmāṅguṣṭhavaktrābhyāṁ lehayedyogavitsadā“ |
SA21n2961:176: tathā cādibuddhe- patite bodhicitte tu sarvasiddhinidhānake |
SA21n2961:181: lohitakusumārcitaṁ kuryāt tadīya rajasā pūjitaṁ vidadhyāt || 5 ||
SA21n2961:195: vajrasavanaṁ karakamalakṣipto hastapadyaprakṣipya dakṣiṇetaraṁ dakṣiṇahastādanyaṁ vāmahastamityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:196: paramādyapātre paramādyaṁ dravyaṁ tasya pātraṁ tatra yathopadeśaṁ upadeśanatikrameṇa |
SA21n2961:204: hastamadhye om va vinyasya [san]tarpya ca vāmahastena bhagavatīmantreṇa dravyamātmano'ṅgapratyaṅgaṁ bhāvayet |
SA21n2961:206: paramādyapātre paramutkṛṣṭatvāt ādyaṁ sukhasyādikāraṇabhūtatvāt tadeva pātraṁ sukhasyādhārabhūtatvāt |
SA21n2961:208: tatra pātre nimittībhūte karakamalaṁ kaṁ sukhaṁ rātīti karaḥ bodhicittamutpadyate tadeva kamalaṁ vivuddhatvāt spṛhaṇīyatvācca śreṣṭhaguṇa yuktatvācca |
SA21n2961:210: tato'nye candradhātu haṁ kṣiptvā'vadhūtivanmanaḥ ūrdhvamutkṣipya vidadhīta vajrasavanaṁ avadhūtigataṁ yadā bodhicittaṁ bhavettadā vajramabhidhīyate |
SA21n2961:213: yathopadeśaṁ gurūpadeśata iti atra gurūcaraṇaḥ śaraṇīkaraṇīyaḥ śayasparśāt hastena vidyāstanasparśāt tadeva sarāgaṁ cittaṁ bhavati,
SA21n2961:214: yadā ca sarāgaṁ cittaṁ bhavet tadānīmavadhūtivikāśo(so) bhavati |
SA21n2961:227: pravidhāya karanyāsaṁ uktakrameṇaiva ṣaḍdevatāmantreṇa karanyāsaṁ kṛtvā,
SA21n2961:228: vṛddhāṅguṣṭhāṅgulisamāyogāt vāmahasta vṛddhānāmikābhyāṁ dravyaṁ gṛhītvā hastamabhimrakṣya tatoṅganyāsaṁ kurvīta |
SA21n2961:235: faṭ faṭ lalāṭe dhūmravarṇacaṇḍikādevyupalakṣakaṁ mantrākṣaraṁ vinyaset |
SA21n2961:237: athavā tadakṣaraṁ tattadakṣarapariṇāmena devatā eva bhāvanīyāḥ |
SA21n2961:238: tato vajravārāhī raktavarṇā trimukhā ṣaḍbhujā mūlamukhaṁ raktaṁ vāme nīlaṁ dakṣiṇe haritaṁ,
SA21n2961:239: vāme kapālakhaṭvāṅgadharaṁ pāśadhāriṇī dakṣiṇe'ṅkuśabrahyamuṇḍakartidhāriṇī ālīdapadā yāminī nīlavarṇā ekamukhā caturbhujā vāme kapālakhaṭvāṅgaghaṇṭā dakṣiṇe ḍamarūkartidhāriṇī |
SA21n2961:240: mohanī saṁcāriṇī saṁtrāsinī caṇḍikā sitapītaharitadhūmravarṇā ekavaktrā caturbhujāḥ sarvāsāmeva vāme kapālakhaṭvāñgaghaṇṭāḥ dakṣiṇe ḍamarūkartikāḥ sarvā evālīdapadā muktakeśinyaḥ trinetrā yā śuklā sā candraprabhā candramaṇḍalinī anyā sūryaprabhā sūryamaṇḍalinyaḥ |
SA21n2961:241: dvitīyo'rthaḥ-kaṁ sukhaṁ karotīti karo bodhicittaṁ tasya nyāsaṁ sarvāṅgavyāpanaṁ vṛddhāṅguṣṭhāṅgulī samāyogāt |
SA21n2961:244: bhage liṅgaṁ pratiṣṭhāpya bodhicittaṁ na cotsṛjet |
SA21n2961:250: zhaṭiti śūnyatānantaraṁ samālakṣaṇīyaṁ śūnyatābhāvanānantaraṁ śrīvajradevīrūpamārakṣāṅganyāsādikaṁ vidhāya vajradharahṛdayaṁ likhitvā lohitakusumārcitaṁ karaṇīyamiti bodhavyam || 7 ||
SA21n2961:262: raṅgārūṇayogajaṁ raṁgo vaṅgo'rūṇaṁ tāmraṁ tayoryogo melakastatra jātaṁ raṅgārūṇayogajaṁ kānsyamityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:263: samaṁ vaiṣamyādidoṣarahitatvāt kutrāvakired vajradharopari vajraṁ dravyaṁ dhārayatīti vajradharaḥ tasyopari madanasahitanṛkapāloparītyarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:265: tatra bhavaiḥ sindūraiḥ suviśiṣṭairūtkṛṣṭaiḥ sicayagataiḥ sicayo vastrāntargataiḥ |
SA21n2961:266: atropadeśaḥ rajasvalāvastra utkṛṣṭasiṁdūreṇa dolāpaṭayantreṇa tarjanyāṅgulyā kānsyapātramavakiret śanakairiti sthairyairita |
SA21n2961:268: vajramadvayajñānaṁ dhārayatīti vajradharaḥ prajñāpaṅkajaṁ tasyopari raṁgārūṇayogajaṁ samamamantraṁ raṁgo rāgayuktaṁ maṇyagrameva arūṇamivārūṇaṁ vidyāpadyakiñjalkaṁ tayoryogo melakaḥ |
SA21n2961:269: tatra jātaṁ raṅgārūṇayogajaṁ mahāsukha sahitaṁ bodhicittamityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:270: ata eva samamamantraṁ sakalavikalpāpagamādamantraṁ sarvajñānasya pratiṣṭhābhūtatvāttadavakired bhujagabhavaiḥ sindūrarāgairityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:271: suviśiṣṭairmahārāgaiḥ sicayagatai riva supratibaddhairityarthaḥ śanakaiḥ krameṇa || 8 ||
SA21n2961:282: cakraṁ samabhilikhya śikhikoṭikaṁ śikhino vahneriva koṭiragraṁ yasya tacchikhikoṭikaṁ trikoṇamityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:283: atropadeśaḥ ṣaḍārameva cakraṁ lekhanīyaṁ jinahṛdayaṁ hṛdayaṁ jinasya sambuddhasya hṛdayaṁ tasyāpi hṛdayaṁ guhyajñānotpattihetutvāt |
SA21n2961:284: tadgarbhe taccakramadhye gāṅgeyaśalākayā suvarṇaśalākayā vāmahastenaiva likhitavyo'yaṁ mantraḥ |
SA21n2961:286: jinahṛdayaṁ hṛdayaṁ vidyākamalaṁ tadeva cakraṁ aśeṣajina jñānālayatvāt |
SA21n2961:288: samabhilikhya suvajreṇa saha saṁyogamāpadya tadgarbhagatasya ca garbho yasya tadgarbhe sunirmāṇacakraṁ tala ityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:289: mantrālīṁ vilikhet manaḥ saṁtrāṇanānmantraḥ bodhicittaṁ tasyāliḥ paṅktiḥ tāṁ bodhicittadhārāṁ arpayet gāṅgeyaśalākayeti |
SA21n2961:290: avadhūtyāstu suvarṇalohitatvāt avadhūtyāmapi sarāgatvāt ataḥ suvarṇasya śalākayā samānatā || 9 ||
SA21n2961:303: dvitīyo'rthaḥ cakrasya bāhyabhāge nirmāṇacakrasya bāhye pūrvottarapaścimārkidigdeśe sarvatraivetyarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:307: vāmena hastena hasto dhāraṇā karmāḥ tatsādharmyāt hasto vāta ( ma )
SA21n2961:314: ākṛṣya [ a ] kaniṣṭha bhuvanavāsinīṁ bhagavatīmāhūya praveśya mantrākṣareṣu vaddhvā vidhānāt |
SA21n2961:315: tatrāyaṁ vidhi jvālāmudrāṁ baddhvā vāmāvartena lalāṭe bhrāmayet ūrdhvaṁ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ fekārapāṭhapūrvakaṁ jaḥ hu va horiti paṭhitvā tatra jaḥkāreṇākarṣaṇaṁ hukāreṇa praveśanaṁ vakāreṇa bandhanaṁ hokāreṇa toṣaṇam |
SA21n2961:316: dvitīyo'rthaḥ ākṛṣya vajradevīṁ caṇḍālīsvarūpāmākṛṣyā'vadhūtyāṁ praveśya mantrākṣareṣu baddhvā ca mantro bodhicittaṁ tasyākṣarāṇi śūnyatā tanmayīkṛtya paritoṣayedvidhānāt |
SA21n2961:322: tadanu saparyāṁ vividhāṁ tasyā vidadhīta mantrarūpāyāḥ |
SA21n2961:330: vividhāṁ mahatīṁ tasyā vajradevyā mantrarūpāyā darpaṇatale sindūrapāta puraḥ saraṁ |
SA21n2961:347: vividhairbalairbahubhirbalairmānsaiḥ samadanairdravyasahitairūpahāraiḥ pañcabhiḥ mudgamāṣamasūrakalāyagodhūmaiḥ atha[vā] rūpaśabdagandharasasparśaiḥ |
SA21n2961:351: balairmānsocchaya pañcaskandhaiḥ sahānupalambhapraveśaḥ kartavyaḥ ata eva samadanairmahāsukhopasthāgata-bodhicittaiḥ śeṣaṁ yathārūtam || 13 ||
SA21n2961:355: pratidivasaṁ pratipakṣaṁ pratimāsaṁ vā tithau daśamyāṁ [ san ] |
SA21n2961:362: pratyahan vā pratipakṣaṁ vā pratimāsaṁ vā daśamyāṁ tithau vā sama(n)
SA21n2961:364: laukikalokottarāṁ siddhiṁ manasi kurvāṇaḥ iyameva bhagavatī sarvasukhasandohaṁ dadātītyabhiprāyaḥ || 14 ||
SA21n2961:368: iti tattvajñānasaṁsiddhau madhyamakarūcibhikṣuśrīdhyānacandra viracitāyāṁ mahāsukhaprakāśikāyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ bāhyapūjāvidhiḥ prathamaḥ || 1 ||
SA21n2961:380: pūrvoditāṁ dīpaṅkaraśākyamuniprabhṛtibhistathāgataiḥ kathitāṁ athavā yathā pūrvabhāvanākāle kathitāṁ tāṁ bhāvayet |
SA21n2961:384: vyasuhṛdayoṣṇagubimba iti vigatā asavaḥ prāṇā yasya saḥ vyasustasya hṛdayaṁ |
SA21n2961:385: uṣṇo gau raśmiryasya sa uṣṇagustasya bimbaṁ vyasuhṛdayoṣṇagubimbaṁ svahṛdayoṣṇagumbimbāṁ asyāyamarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:387: etaduktaṁ bhavati bodhicittaṁ maṇyagragatvā vyāvṛtya yadā nirmāṇacakragataṁ tadā yādṛśaṁ sukhamutpadyate tatsūcakaḥ śava( asava )
SA21n2961:388: stasya hṛdayaṁ śūnyatā sūryabimbaṁ tu nirvikalpajñānamārtaṇḍadyotakaṁ sakalavikalpāndhakāravidhvaṁsanāt |
SA21n2961:393: kīdṛśīṁ - sandhyāsindūravarṇāṁ kharakaranirāpāstasaptārkakāntīṁ kartrīṁ sarvārtihantrīṁ bibhratīṁ sfuradamṛtaghṛṇīṁ bibhratīṁ savyadoṣṇā |
SA21n2961:394: bibhrāṇāṁ vāmadoṣṇā kamalamatisitaṁ raktapūrṇadhvajādyāṁ kālyā dambholikālyā parigataśirasaṁ muktamūrdhvokha ( ttha ) hastām || 2 ||
SA21n2961:400: kharakaranikarāpāstasaptārkakāntīṁ kharastīvraḥ karo raśmiḥ kharaścāsau karaśceti kharakarastasya nikaraḥ samūhaḥ kharakaranikareṇāpāstā vidhvastā saptārkakāntiryathā tāṁ kartrīṁ bibhratīmiti sambandhaḥ |
SA21n2961:404: kena bibhratīṁ savyadoṣṇā dakṣiṇabāhunā dakṣiṇe sūryadhātoravasthānāt prajñāyāstīkṣṇasvabhāvatvāt dakṣiṇe kartridhāraṇaṁ yuktaṁ kiṁ ca prajñā prajñāpraharṣeṇa mayā mahāsukhacakre śrībodhicittaṁ vidhṛtamityapi darśayati kamalaṁ bibhrāṇamiti sambandhaḥ |
SA21n2961:408: dhvajādyāṁ dhvajena khaṭvāṅgena ādyo mahati khaṭvāṅgadhāraṇamavadhūtyāṁ bodhicittadhāraṇasūcanam |
SA21n2961:409: kālyā dambholikālyā parigataśirasaṁ kasya mastakasya āliḥ paṅktistayā kālyā śūṇyapañcakapāladhāraṇāt anena bodhicittadhāraṇaṁ mahāsukhacakre vyaktīkṛtaṁ dambholikālyā dambholirvajraṁ dambholireva dambholikaḥ tasyālirdambholikāliḥ tayā dambholikālyā parigataṁ sarvatobhāvena jñātaṁ śiro yasyāḥ śūnyatā samanvitabodhi ( citta )
SA21n2961:411: muktamūrdhvotthahastāṁ muktaṁ yathā bhavati tathā ūrdhveṇottho hasto yasyāḥ || 2 ||
SA21n2961:415: punaḥ kīdṛśam muṇḍālīmaṇḍitāṅgīṁ mukhagaladasṛjaṁ svādaguṁ muktanādāṁ savye cordhvaṁ kirāsyāṁ varaśubhagamanāṁ krodhamūlānanāntām |
SA21n2961:416: sānandāṁ sānurāgāṁ vividharasayutāmarddhaparyaṅkanṛtyāṁ mudrāṣaṇmudritāṅgīṁ vyapagatavasanāṁ ṣoḍaśābdāṁ varāṅgīm || 3 ||
SA21n2961:422: mukhagaladasṛjaṁ mukhāṁ galadasṛk raktaṁ yasyāḥ skandhādicaturmārāṇāṁ śūnyatāraktapānāt |
SA21n2961:427: savye codrdhvaṁ kirāsyāṁ dakṣiṇe ūrdhvaśūkaramukhīṁ saṁvṛtiviśuddhitaḥ saṁvṛtermohamohasvarūpatvāt śūkaramukhadhāraṇaṁ śūkarasya mohanirjātatvāt |
SA21n2961:433: mudrāṣaṇmudirtāṅgīṁ mudaṁ harṣaṁ rātīti mudrāḥ mudrāṣaṭibharmudritamaṅgayasyāścakrīkuṇḍalakaṇṭhikarūcakamekhalāsūtrādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaṭpāramitāviśuddhitaḥ |
SA21n2961:447: uktakrameṇa jñānacakrākarṣaṇavidhiṁ vidhāya mantrī vidhānavit yathāvidhijñaḥ |
SA21n2961:448: alikābhimukhaṁ bhramaramukhasamīpa bhramantaṁ kulālacakravat ekaṁ na dvayaṁ drutaṁ śīghram || 4 ||
SA21n2961:459: prāguktamiva sindūrapūjāyāṁ yathācakra nirdiṣṭaṁ mantrākṣaraparipūrṇaṁ tathaiva viyadvati dhātau ākāśayukte dhātau dharmodayāmityarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:474: drāvayedurūsukhacakraṁ dravīkurvanmahāsukhacakraṁ sravadamṛtasārakṛtavasanaṁ etadvodhicittakṛtasthānaṁ taccakraṁ gudamedrāntaraṁ sthitaṁ bhāvanīyam |
SA21n2961:476: prathamaṁ tāvadyatnataḥ sarāgaṁ cittaṁ karaṇīyaṁ vidyāpaṅkajavajrayogataḥ pūrvānubhūtasukhasmaraṇāt |
SA21n2961:477: mahāsukhacakrātsambhogacakraṁ sambhogacakrāddharmacakraṁ dharmacakrānnirmāṇacakraṁ nirmāṇacakrādvajramūlacakraṁ vajramūlacakrādvajramadhyaṁ vajramadhyādvajrāgragate śrībodhicitte yādṛśamanutpādalakṣaṇaṁ sukhamutpadyate tasminneva sukhe sthitvā punarapi tadvodhicittaṁ vyāvṛtāvadhūtyāṁ praveśayet |
SA21n2961:479: atra śrīvajraguroḥ yadvaddhābaddharajorājiḥ sevanīyā bodhicittaṁ tu sarvathaiva na parityajanīyaṁ parityāgādvirāgaḥ syāttathā ca sekoddeśe sambuddhabhāṣitam |
SA21n2961:499: tathā ca śrīkālacakre- madhye prāṇapraveśaḥ saraviśaśigaterbandhanaṁ savyavāme cittaṁ mudrāprasaṅge paramasukhagataṁ vajrasambodhanaṁ ca |
SA21n2961:501: karasalilajollāsanaṁ saukhyahetoḥ bījātyāgaḥ sasaukhyo maraṇabhayaharaḥ śrīgurorvaktrametat ||
SA21n2961:507: idānīṁ tasya mahāsukhasamanvitasya cakrasvarūpamāha- kāyatrayasvabhāvaṁ paramaṁ sahajātmakaṁ jagavdyāpinam [ ca ] |
SA21n2961:513: dharmasambhoganirmāṇarūpaṁ tatra dharmakāyaḥ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ sarvajñavedyaḥ śūnyatāsvarūpaḥ anutpādajñānalakṣaṇaḥ sambhogakāyo dvātriṁśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanasamanvitaḥ puṇyasambhāraniryā( jā )
SA21n2961:514: to nirūddhacittacaittapracāro bodhisattvaikagamyo nirmāṇakāyaḥ pūrvapraṇidhāno vedhavineyakuśalabalanirjāto hi cintāmaṇivannirvikalpaḥ sarvābhiprāyaparipūrakaḥ etat svabhāvam |
SA21n2961:516: sahajātmakaṁ sahaja ātmasvabhāvo yasya kāyatrayasyaikatvāt mahāsukhakāya ucyate sa eva yuganaddhalakṣaṇaḥ saṁvṛtiparamārthaikarasaḥ kathaṁ saṁvṛtiparamārthayoḥ ekatvamuhyate yāvatā saṁvṛterbhāvasu(sva)
SA21n2961:518: parasparavirūddhayoraikyaṁ kathamaikyaṁ ataḥ pratividhīyate tathāgataḥ svāpekṣayā nirūddhacittaścaittaḥ |
SA21n2961:520: rūpa eva vineyacittāpekṣayā pratibhāsanādbhāvasvabhāvaṁ tato na virodhaḥ kalpavṛkṣavat |
SA21n2961:521: sarvajanābhiprāyaparipūrakaṁ sādhūktaṁ kiṁ tu nirūddho cittacaittarūpaṁ kāyastiṣṭhatu kāyasthiṣṭhatu kāyasyaiva kāyacittādhīnatvāt |
SA21n2961:522: na doṣo yataḥ puṇyasambhāranirjātaḥ samantata āsaṁsāraṁ tiṣṭhatyevaṁ jñānasambhārabalāt |
SA21n2961:524: tataḥ sarvameva svasthaṁ ataeva sarvajagavdyāpakaṁ sarvasyaiva hi bhāvasya yuganaddhātmakatvāt sfuradamitaśāntasantati ravinaśvarasvabhāvatvāt |
SA21n2961:538: etat pūrvoktaṁ mahāsukhaṁ pratyahaṁ pratisandhyaṁ vā |
SA21n2961:539: yadā yadā avadhūtyāṁ vāyuḥ paviśati athavā catuḥsandhyaṁ yathākṣaṇaṁ vā sarvadaivetyarthaḥ |
SA21n2961:540: yāvatsiddhinimittaṁ siddhiḥ mahāmudrā tasyāḥ nimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ yāvanna bhavati tāvadbhāvayevdyaktam sarvatraiva |
SA21n2961:545: tadevamāha- ayatnajaṁ prītilayānubandhanāt yadā bhaved vyaktamidaṁ vibhāvitam |
SA21n2961:552: idaṁ vibhāvitaṁ vyaktaṁ bhavet sfuṭataraṁ bhavet |
SA21n2961:553: tadāha kaśācapeṭādihate na vedanā kaśācarmachaṭā capeṭā karaprahārādinā svāṁ hate yadi duḥkhavedanā na bhavati tadā bhavetsiddhiradūravartinī samīpabhūtā siddhiriti veditavyam || 9 ||
SA21n2961:557: aparamapi nimittamāha- pratāḍitānāṁ paṇavādikānāṁ paṭudhvanirna śruta(ti)
SA21n2961:564: prakarṣeṇa mahatā prakāreṇa tāḍitānāṁ paṇavādikānāṁ paṇavā-mardala-ādiśabdena dakkābheryādayaḥ teṣāṁ paṭudhvanirmahāśabdo na śrutigocaro na śrotravijñānaviṣayo bhavati |
SA21n2961:565: aparamapi nimittamāha-yadāpyate bodhiranuttarāgrā svapne svapne yadā yogī samyaksambuddhamātmānaṁ paśyati tadā acirād dhyānavato'grasiddhiḥ prastutaiva tarhi mahāsukhabhāvanāyuktasya yogino'grasiddhirvajradharatvaṁ syādeveti || 10 ||
SA21n2961:569: etatsiddhinimittaṁ dṛṣṭvā yat kartavyam tadāha- dṛṣṭvā siddhinimittaṁ pitṛvanagirikuñje vṛkṣamūlādau |
SA21n2961:576: ajasraṁ nirantaraṁ pitṛvanagirikuñje vṛkṣamūlādau pitṛvanaṁ śmaśānaṁ giriḥ parvataḥ kuñjo latāgṛham |
SA21n2961:578: ādiśabdāt śūnyāgārādi tatra nivasan tiṣṭhan evaṁvidhe sthāne nivasan tiṣṭhan yogī zhaṭityeva mahāsukhasamādhiṁ sākṣātkuryāt cittavikṣepābhāvāt || 11 ||
SA21n2961:582: samādhisiddhau yadbhavati tadāha- siddhau vasudhādīnāṁ bhavati layo hyuttarottarakramaśaḥ |
SA21n2961:583: khyāti tadā gaganābhaṁ prabhāsvaraṁ jñānamātraṁ sat || 12 ||
SA21n2961:588: vasudhādīnāṁ bhavati layo hyuttarottarakramaśaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyuvijñānādīnāṁ layo niṣpadyate |
SA21n2961:589: tatra bhūdhāturjale līno bhavati jalaṁ tejasi tejo vāyau vāyuścitte cittaṁ cetasi |
SA21n2961:591: tathā coktam- bhūdhāturlīyate toye toyaṁ tejasi līyate |
SA21n2961:596: evaṁ sati kiṁ syāt khyāti prakāśate tadā nirodho gaganābhaṁ ākāśasadṛśaṁ sakalavikalpāpagamāt prabhāsvaraṁ nirmalaṁ jñānamātraṁ māyopamaṁ ataeva sadutkṛṣṭaṁ atrocyate-sarvanirodhe jñānamapi kathaṁ tiṣṭhatu tasya jñeyasāpekṣatvāt |
SA21n2961:597: na vaktavyaṁ jñānamātraṁ śūnyatālakṣaṇamabhipretaṁ svabhāvaśūnyaṁ māyopamaṁ vikalpamanahīnaṁ tadatra na niṣidhyate |
SA21n2961:598: tathā coktaṁ śrīśākyanāthena - tāmrasya kālimā yadvadrajayogena naśyati |
SA21n2961:599: na tasya satvatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā |
SA21n2961:601: na tasya jñānatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā |
SA21n2961:608: ata eva tāni yogī samāhito lakṣayenmanasā || 13 ||
SA21n2961:614: kiyanti tāni cihanānīti cihnāni tu pañcaprakārāṇi vidurjānantīti tajjñāstadarthavicakṣaṇā ata eva kāraṇāttāni cihnāni yogī samādhiyukto lakṣayenmanasā nimittāni krameṇa sambhavanti || 13 ||
SA21n2961:618: tatra kramamāha- prathamaṁ mṛgatṛṣṇābhaṁ dhūmākāraṁ dvitīyakaṁ cihanam |
SA21n2961:624: mṛgatṛṣṇābhaṁ marīcikāsadṛśaṁ dhūmākāraṁ dvitīyakaṁ cihanaṁ etatspaṣṭameva khadyotavattṛtīyaṁ jyotirliṁganavatturyaṁ caturthaṁ dīpojjvalaṁ dīpakalikāsadṛśaṁ spaṣṭaṁ vyaktam || 14 ||
SA21n2961:637: evaṁ labdhanimitaḥ uktakrameṇa prāptanimitto yogī mudrāṁ mahatīmavāpnoti |
SA21n2961:638: mahāmudrāṁ sarvākāravarasahitaṁ śūnyatā sākṣāt kuryāt ityarthaḥ || 15 ||
SA21n2961:642: utthātukāmaḥ praṇipatya yoginīṁ nāthaṁ ca kasthaṁ samudīrya mūḥkṛtim |
SA21n2961:643: utthāya kṛtyaṁ vidadhīta tattvadhīstiṣṭhetsadā yogayugena yogavit || 16 ||
SA21n2961:648: tasmātsamādherūtthātukāmo yadā bhavati tadā yoginīṁ vajravārāhīṁ praṇipatya namaskṛtya nāthaṁ ca kaḥ śirasthaṁ samudīrya uccārya ca mūḥkṛtiṁ mūriti mantraṁ paṭhitvā utthāya kṛtyaṁ vidadhīta tattvadhīḥ niḥ svabhāvabuddhistiṣṭhet sadā yogayugena yuganaddhāhaṁkāreṇa yogavinmahāsukhasamādhijñānam || 16 ||
SA21n2961:663: adhyeṣitaḥ prārthito bahuśaḥ anekadhā śiṣyaiḥ kṛtamaṇḍalaiḥ kṛtaṁ maṇḍalaṁ yairmaṇḍalakaraṇa puraḥ saraṁ gurūradhyeṣaṇīyaḥ |
SA21n2961:664: padābjanataiḥ padapadyaṁ nataiḥ yeṣāṁ tairvimantraiḥ vimantrarbhagavatī mantrajasthitau daśamyāṁ nānyasyāṁ tithau vidadhīta kuryādanugrahaṁ kṛpāṁ teṣāṁ śiṣyāṇām || 1 ||
SA21n2961:675: cakrasthitāṁ ṣaḍāracakre sthitāṁ vihitayogaḥ kṛtasamāpattiḥ athavā bhagavatyā mahābhinnamūrtiḥ |
SA21n2961:677: paramādyaṁ niṣkramettasmādbhagavatīpūjāsthānāt etaduktaṁ bhavati bhagavatī pūjyate tantrāntaḥpaṭādikaṁ dātavyaṁ tato bhagavatīṁ pūjayitvā tasmāddeśānmantraviśuddhaṁ dravyaṁ gṛhītvā bahirgacchet |
SA21n2961:690: ūrdhvasthaṁ taddatta dakṣiṇaṁ kṛtasarvasvaparityāgaṁ kusumasrajaṁ dadhānaṁ puṣpamālāṁ hastadvayena bibhrāṇaṁ dhyātake śirasi nātho gurūryena taṁ gurūrvajragurūrityarthaḥ || 3 ||
SA21n2961:694: tadanu ca yathoktaṁ devīcakraṁ prodyanmarīcikaṁ rayavat |
SA21n2961:700: tadanantaraṁ yathoktaṁ devīcakraṁ ṣaḍāraṁ mantrākṣaraparipūrṇaṁ prodyanmarīcikaṁ sfuradraśmikaṁ rayavat bhramat evaṁvidhaṁ cakraṁ dhyātvā cintayitvā antavāsigātre antavāsī śiṣyastasya gātre nirmāṇacakre tadanantaraṁ kiṁ kartavyaṁ vajrabhṛttasya sandadyāt tadā paripūrṇaṁ pātraṁ śiṣyasya sandadyāt śiṣyeṇa ca sarvamevopayoktavyam |
SA21n2961:712: anena krameṇāveśaḥ syāt tatra vividha āveśaḥ kāyāveśo vāgāveśaścittāveśaśca |
SA21n2961:713: tatra kāyāveśe utkalikā romāñco bhavati prakampanaṁ gātrāṇāṁ syuḥ harṣāśrupāto bhuvi patitvā yāti cittāveśe jñānotpādaḥ svarūpapratibhānaṁ svayameva syāt vāgāveśe apūrvapravacanaṁ sārūpyaṁ sadṛśaṁ sarvajñajñānapratipādanam |
SA21n2961:715: athavā itthamapi mandapuṇyasyāveśo na bhavet tadāyaṁ vidhiḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
SA21n2961:716: chāgalapañcāṅgaṁ pañcatathāgatabījenādhitiṣṭhet mahātailamahāguggulasahitaṁ samabhāgaṁ tu kārayet tena vārāhyā mantreṇa dhūpo deyaḥ ghrāṇita mātreṇa samāveśo bhavati niścitamiti || 5 ||
SA21n2961:728: śraddhāyuktasya guṇinaḥ prājñasya gurūbuddhābhinnasadbhaktergurau buddhe tayorabhinnatvāt sadbhaktiryasya yathā śāstāraṁ paśyati tathā gurūmapi || 6 ||
SA21n2961:732: kathayenna yogamenaṁ sadyaḥ pratyayakaraṁ susiddhaṁ vā |
SA21n2961:739: na kathayenna prakāśayedenaṁ yogaṁ pūrvoktasamādhiṁ sadyaḥ pratyayakaraṁ na mitreṇa pratītijanakaṁ susiddhidaṁ śobhanā siddhirmahāmudrā tāṁ dadātīti śraddhāvirahitamanasaḥ śraddhāparityaktacittasya bhaktivihīnasya śiṣyasya || 7 ||
SA21n2961:743: idānīṁ punardṛṣṭvānuśaṁsāmāha- vidadhāti yastu pūjāṁ devīcakrasya mantrayuktasya |
SA21n2961:749: yo mantrapūjāṁ kurūte devīcakrasya vajravārāhībhagavatyā ṣaḍāracakrasya mantrayuktasya mantraparipūrṇasya tasyāṣṭau bhayānyapayānti siṁhahastivahnisarpacauranigaḍajalebhyo bhayānyapayānti pāpāni ca mahānti ca pañcānantaryakarmāṇyapi palāyante || 8 ||
SA21n2961:759: loke paramasaubhāgyasampanno bhavati dāridrayaṁ nirdhanatā vyādhiḥ kāyapīḍājarāvārdhakyaṁ duḥkhaṁ kāyikī vedanā daurmanasyaṁ caitasikī vedanā bhramo bhrāntiḥ kalirvivādaḥ kaluṣaṁ pāpaṁ kleśā rāgadveṣamohāḥ grahadyupadravāḥ nānāvidhā anekaprakārā apayāntītyanena sambandhaḥ || 9 ||
SA21n2961:763: yo japati cakramantraṁ dhyātvā hṛdaye nirodhavācā'sau |
SA21n2961:769: cakramantraṁ cakrasahitamantraṁ dhyātvā cintayitvā hṛdaye nirodhavācā manasā asau mantrī aṣṭau siddhīḥ prāpnoti añjanaguṭikāpādukāsiddhauṣadhimaṇimantrayakṣastrīparapurapraveśān,
SA21n2961:770: pañcābhijñāḥ divyaṁ śrotraṁ divyacakṣuḥ paracittajñānaṁ pūrvanivāsānusmṛti ṛddhivijñānaṁ tathāṣṭaguṇān aṇimā laghimā garimā īśitvaṁ vaśitvaṁ kartṛtvaṁ bhojyatvaṁ icchāprakāmajā(tā)
SA21n2961:781: yo mantrī kiravaktrāṁ kolāsyāṁ dhyāyati pratidivasaṁ yatna taścatuḥ sandhyaṁ prātarmadhyāhnavikāle madhyarātriṣu sa mṛtiṁ maraṇaṁ jayati |
SA21n2961:787: tasyodbhavanti dayitā vividhāśca vidyā yo bhāvayatyaśanikolamukhīṁ sacakrām || 12 || ||
SA21n2961:796: vastraṁ vasanaṁ annaṁ bhaktādi pānaṁ dugdhādi dhanaṁ suvarṇādi dhānyaṁ brīhyādi viśālabhūmirmahatī pṛthvī prāsādo divyagṛhaṁ divyaśayanaṁ tūlikādi āsanaṁ siṁhāsanādi sādhanāni mañcādi etāni sakalāni tasya mantriṇo bhavanti |
SA21n2961:797: dayitāśca divyāṅganāḥ vividhāśca vidyā nānāśilpakalādayaḥ yo bhāvayatyaśanikolamukhīṁ vajrakolāsyāṁ sacakrāṁ adhaūrdhvacakradvayasahitām || 12 ||
SA21n2961:803: gurūparamparāyāto mantroddhāro vilikhyate- mantroddhāramataḥ paramabhidhāsye vajrayoginīhṛdayam |
SA21n2961:809: ataḥ paraṁ pūrvoktādanantaraṁ mantroddhāramabhidhāsye vakṣyāmi vajrayoginīhṛdayaṁ kolamukhīhṛdayaṁ karṇātkarṇamupāgataṁ karṇaparamparāsamāyātaṁ atyantagopanīyatvāt || 1 ||
SA21n2961:814: tatra likhet paripāṭita ālikāliṁ tathaiva koṇam || 2 ||
SA21n2961:820: marūdgaṇālayopetāṁ ūnapañcāśakoṣṭhānvitaṁ paripāṭito yathākramaṁ ālikāliṁ tatra cakre likhet |
SA21n2961:823: ekaṁ trīṇi tathā pañca sapta nava viśeṣataḥ |
SA21n2961:831: akṣaroddhāraḥ sampratyabhidhīyate- zhādharagaṁ ḍādharasthaṁ hādharagavibhūṣitaṁ samāyuktam |
SA21n2961:837: zhakārasyādharago yastaṁ zhādharagaṁ akāraṁ likhet iti sarvatra sambandhaḥ |
SA21n2961:838: ḍakārasyādharastho yastaṁ ḍādharasthaṁ ukāraṁ hādharagavibhūṣitaṁ hakārasyādharo yastaṁ hādharagaṁ makāraṁ tena vibhūṣitaṁ samāyuktaṁ akāraukārābhyāṁ samāyoge sati aokārastaṁ makāreṇa bhūṣitam |
SA21n2961:852: chordhvasthitaṁ chakārasyordhvasthitaṁ bakāraṁ saṁyuta ṭordhvasthitaṁ refaṁ tadanu lekhyaṁ ( va )
SA21n2961:853: ḍādharayutaṁ ṣādharagaṁ ḍakārasyādhara ukārastena yuktaṁ ṣādharagaṁ bakāraṁ ( bu )
SA21n2961:854: ṣordhvasthita yukta śordhvagataṁ ṣakārasyordhvasthitaṁ dhakāraṁ tena yuktaṁ śakārasyordhvagataṁ dakāram ( ddha ) || 4 ||
SA21n2961:864: ñādharayutaṁ lṛtalasthaṁ ñakārasyādharaṁ ākāraṁ tena yutaṁ lṛkārasya talasthaṁ ḍakāraṁ ( ḍā)
SA21n2961:865: ṭādharayutaṁ pordhvasaṁsthitaṁ tadanu ṭakārasyādharaṁ ikāraṁ tena yutaṁ pakārasyordhvasthitaṁ kakāraṁ ( ki )
SA21n2961:866: ṭhādharagānvita fordhvagaṁ ṭhakārasyādharaṁ īkāraṁ tena sahitaṁ fakārasyordhvagaṁ nakāraṁ ( nī )
SA21n2961:867: aivamayutaṁ haṭāntaḥ sthaṁ aikārasya vāmaṁ ekāraṁ tatsthitaṁ haṭāntasthaṁ hakāraṭakārayormadhyagataṁ yakāram ( ye ) || 5 ||
SA21n2961:877: ṭhasavyasametaṁ bhādharasusaṁsthitaṁ tadanu ṭhakārasya dakṣiṇagataṁ refaṁ tena yuktaṁ bhādharasusaṁsthitaṁ bhakārasyādharasusaṁsthitaṁ jakāraṁ ( jra)
SA21n2961:879: tavāmagayutaṁ ṭhalamadhyagaṁ takārasya vāmagaṁ ṇakāraṁ tena yutaṁ ṭhakāralakārayormadhyagataṁ refam ( ṇṇa ) || 6 ||
SA21n2961:890: ntafalamadhyaṁ tṛtīyavargādi vāmagasametaṁ sarvakalāntaṁ aḥkāra fakāraśca tayormadhye nakāraḥ tṛtīyavargasyādi ṭakārastasya vāmagaṁ ikāraḥ tena sahitaṁ ( nī )
SA21n2961:891: ṇordhvayutaṁ lādharaṁ ṇakārasyordhve ekāraṁ tatsahitaṁ lādharagaṁ lādharagataṁ yakāraṁ ( ye )
SA21n2961:894: bhatalagaṁ ṭhasavyayutaṁ bhakārasya talagaṁ jakāraṁ ṭhakārasya dakṣiṇaṁ refaṁ tadyuktam ( jra ) || 7 ||
SA21n2961:903: tordhvagayutaṁ ṣādharagaṁ takārasyordhvagaṁ aikāraṁ tatsahitaṁ ṣakārasyādharagaṁ bakāraṁ ( vai)
SA21n2961:904: thordhvagasaṁyuktaṁ ṇādharagaṁ paścāt thakārasyordhvagataṁ aokāraṁ tatsaṁyuktaṁ ṇādharaṁ refaṁ ( ro )
SA21n2961:906: ṭhādharasaṁyuktaṁ fordhvasthaṁ ṭhakārasyādharagaṁ īkāraṁ tadyuktaṁ fakārasyordhvasthitaṁ nakāraṁ ( ra )
SA21n2961:908: ṇordhvayuktaṁ lādharagaṁ ṇakārasyordhvaṁ ekāraṁ tadyuktaṁ lakārasyādharagaṁ yakāram ( ye ) || 8 ||
SA21n2961:917: ḍādharaśūnyasametaṁ trivatalagaṁ ḍakārasyādharaṁ ukāraṁ śūnyamanusvāraṁ tābhyāṁ sametaṁ vatalagaṁ hakāraṁ ( hu )
SA21n2961:920: ratalaṁ refatalaṁ ṭakāra samudāyena faṭtrayaṁ bodhavyaṁ ( faṭ faṭ faṭ )
SA21n2961:921: thādharayutaṁ śādharagaṁ ñādharagaṁ samāyuktaṁ cāpi thakārasyādharaṁ vakāraṁ tatsahitaṁ śakārasyādharagaṁ sakāraṁ ñādharagasamāyuktaṁ cāpi ñakārasyādharaṁ ākāraṁ samāyuktaṁ ākāreṇetyarthaḥ ( svā ) || 9 ||
SA21n2961:930: sayamadhyagaṁ zhavāmasametaṁ sakārayakārayormadhyagataṁ hakāraṁ zhakārasya vāmagenākāreṇa sahitamityarthaḥ ( hā ) |
SA21n2961:931: uktākṣarakṛto rahasya akṣarakṛtakādyakṣarāt samākṛṣya rahasyataddhetutvāt kosau rahasyaḥ mantroyaṁ aśanidevyāḥ |
SA21n2961:932: vajravārāhyāḥ mantra ityarthaḥ ayaṁ mantraḥ kiṁkartavyaḥ ata āha lekhyo japyo vibhāvyaśca |
SA21n2961:938: te sādhyamānā dadatīha vittānyayaṁ tu saukhyaṁ sadhanaṁ dadāti || 11 || ||
SA21n2961:948: kalpakuṭhaḥ kalpavṛkṣaḥ agrakumbho bhadraghaṭaḥ śrīkāmadhuk śrīkāmadhenuḥ api ye praśastāḥ khyātāḥ santi te sādhyamānāḥ santo vittāni dadati |
SA21n2961:950: ayaṁ punarmantrarājaḥ saukhyaṁ lokottaraṁ mahāsukhaṁ dadāti |
SA21n2961:951: sadhanaṁ dhanasahitamityarthaḥ anye punaḥ sādhitāḥ santo dhanameva kiṁ ca dadati na nirūttarasukhaṁ ayaṁ tu sarvapradaḥ tataścāyameva sarvaprakāreṇa sarvadā sarvābhivāñchitasiddhyarthaṁ loke lokottarasiddhinimittakaṁ bodhisattvaiḥ sevyaḥ || 11 ||
SA21n2961:956: [ svādhiṣṭhānam ] yasminnayaṁ pātragate vyalekhi pūjānimittaṁ vidhinā vidhijñaḥ |
SA21n2961:957: bālasya rakṣā vidhivadvidheyā baddhena doḥ kaṇṭhaśikhāsu bāhau || 1 ||
SA21n2961:962: yasmindarpaṇādibhājanagato'yaṁ mantrarājo vyalekhi pūjānimittaṁ vidhinā yathāvidhijña ssanmantribhiḥ bālasya rakṣā vidhivadvidheyā śiśoḥ rakṣā kāryā bhagavatīpūjā puraḥ saraṁ baddhena tena mantrasahitaṁ sindūreṇa kutra doḥ kaṇṭhaśikhāsu bāhau kaṇṭhe śikhāyām || 1 ||
SA21n2961:966: dṛṣṭvā'payānti bhujagāḥ śiśukaṁ sarakṣaṁ bhūtā grahā niśicarāḥ sapiśācasaṁghāḥ |
SA21n2961:967: anye ca bālakabhayārtikarāḥ subhīmāḥ siṁhaṁ yathā vanacarā balinaṁ bhayārtāḥ || 2 ||
SA21n2961:973: śiśukaṁ dṛṣṭvā sarakṣaṁ rakṣāsahitaṁ bhūtagrahā niśicarāḥ sapiśācasaṁghā api palāyante anye'pi bālakabhayārtikarāḥ ḍākinyādayaḥ subhīmāḥ paramabhayānakāḥ |
SA21n2961:974: atra dṛṣṭāntamāha-siṁhaṁ dṛṣṭvā yathā vanacarā mṛgādayaḥ apayānti bhayabhītā prapalāyante,
SA21n2961:975: siṁhaṁ kiṁ viśiṣṭaṁ balinaṁ balavantaṁ vanacarāḥ kiṁ viśiṣṭāḥ palāyante bhayārtā bhayapīḍitāḥ santaḥ || 2 ||
SA21n2961:979: saṁprāpya sadupadeśaṁ dṛṣṭvā saṁpratyayaṁ ca yogasya |
SA21n2961:986: samprāpya sadupadeśaṁ yathāvadupadeśaṁ labdhvā dṛṣṭvā saṁpratyayaṁ ca yogasya asya bhagavatīyogasya pratītiṁ vīkṣya sfuradamalajñānaṁ saṁvasatiḥ sfuratprakāśarūpatvāt amalaṁ jñānaṁ sarvakleśoparamāttasya saṁvātiḥ sthānam || 3 ||
SA21n2961:996: ataeva tatsaṁprāptyai tadupadeśalābhāya saṁsevyaṁ samyagārādhanīyaṁ sugurorlabdhanimittasya pādāmburūhaṁ caraṇapadyaṁ sāmnā saumanasyena athavā pradānavidhinā prakṛṣṭavastradānena kāyakleśairvā praṇāmairvā sarvaprakāreṇa guroḥ ārādhanaṁ sarvam || 4 ||
SA21n2961:1000: tattvajñānāgrasiddhirbahuhitajananī yā jananyeva loke sattvānāṁ yanmayāsītkuśalakaluṣaṁ pūrṇacandrāṁśuśubhram |
SA21n2961:1001: bhūyāsustena lokāḥ kalimalavikalāḥ śuddhasambodhibhājo labdhvā mudrāmudārāṁ bhavabhayaśamanīṁ sarvasattvārthakartrīm || 5 ||
SA21n2961:1007: tattvaṁ anutpādaṁ tathā ca jinajananyāṁ yo'nutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṁ sā prajñāpāramitā tasya tattvajñānāgrasiddhiḥ śreṣṭhasidhiśca hitajananī cakrapuṇyajananī yo loke traidhātuke jananyeva sarvasattvānāṁ samīhitārthaprasavanādvahupuṇyamāsīt kuśalaṁ akaluṣaṁ kleśarahitaṁ pūrṇacandrāṁśuvat śubhraṁ bhūyāsuḥ tena puṇyena lokāḥ kalimalavikalāḥ kalivivādo malaṁ kleśāstābhyāṁ vikalā rahitāḥ śuddhasambodhibhājaḥ samyaksambodhimabhilabdhvā udārā mahāmudrāṁ prāpya bhavabhayaśamanīṁ bhavaḥ saṁsāraḥ śamo nirvāṇaṁ tayoḥ śamanīṁ bhavanirvāṇagrahanivāraṇīṁ sarvasattvārthakartrīṁ sarvasattvānāṁ sambodhikāriṇītyarthaḥ || 5 ||
